Posts.Content: THANK YOU!! Your the greatest!! Hugs, Diane
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer walk

Posts.Content: Sorry about the racy heart, I was on 4 treatments of AC. My heart would be racy at times,felt like it was pounding and I would have palpitations. I've had 2 echocardiagrams and all is fine. I just had 2 treatments of Taxol/Herceptin and I had alot of palpitations this past week. The doc is sending me to a heart doc tomorrow to have a 24 hr. halter moniter put on. Mention your racy heart as they will want to keep an eye on things!! Good Luck Diane:)
Posts.Title: Anybody else get racy after a/c treatments

Posts.Content: Sounds like your are taking good care of your sister. Hope all goes well!! Lots of HUGS!!
Posts.Title: 1 down 3 to go BC Sucks!

Posts.Content: I'm so sorry for the pain your going through. The advice that ladies all gave you sounds good. I didn't have any problems in the vj area but I do get constipated from the chemo. I drink lots of water try to eat lots of veggies, and the prunes help me also. Plus, I do use the stool softner. Hugs, Diane

Posts.Title: ☺When Is It Time?☻

Posts.Content: For my chemo treatments I get benedryl first for any allergic reactions. I drove to one of my treatments and when I left I felt like I had one too many to drink. Made me very groggy. So my suggestion would be to have someone drive you till you see how you will react to the treatments. Hugs, Diane
Posts.Title: Chemo and driving?

Posts.Content: to you and hubby. Have a wonderful trip to NY city. You'll have a great time. I only live 2 hours away and go there often. It's a great place to visit. Hugs, Diane
